name: Sssnakes (itch)
description:
Sssnakes!

Help this adorable little snake move on to a new home by making some helpful, yet fragile, balloons for them.

Had a ton of fun with this Jam. It's been awhile since I've used Bolt, as I've been practicing my C#, and I'm happy to say that my newfound knowledge has transferred nicely! Please let me know what you think!

A game for my recently passed mother. Her favorite game, the only game besides mine that she would rave about, was Balloon Kid. She used to always make this little hissing sound at me too. It really only made sense to make a game with the theme "Moving On" about her as a snake with a balloon- free to float wherever now. Much love, mama. ✌

Tools used:

  • Unity3D
  • Blender 2.8
  • Bolt
  • ToonyColorsPro2
  • Cinemachine
